page.title: 17PLAYGROUND GAMES Part 1
page.content: 1. SILLIES-Two equal sides,one side is on, the others run.When a runner is ticked by an 'on' person,the runner must stand by the wall and wait to be ticked by another runner.Those 'on' must try to prevent this.When all the runners are ticked,they then become the side which is 'on'. 2.TICK- A person is 'on' and when the 'on' person ticks another then that person is 'on'. 3.ROTTEN EGGS OR BALL TICK- A person is chosen to be 'on'.The others are runners.One of the runners throws the ball as far away as possible from the 'on' person.All the runners disperse quickly.The 'on' person retrieves the ball and shouts 'stop'.The runners stand still and the 'on' person tries to hit a runner with the ball.If the ball hits a runner,that runner becomes 'on'.If it misses the game is repeated.
